title: Former MAFS star Davina Rankin shares a photo of her growing baby bump
text:
Davina Rankin is just about ready to give birth.

Taking to Instagram on Thursday, the 28-year-old former Married At First Sight star shared a 'bump update' with her followers.

'5 WEEKS TO GO (give or take how impatient or stubborn Miss Manuel is),' she captioned a photo of herself kneeling on her bed in white lace underwear and a printed robe.

Baby bump: Former Married At First Sight star shared a photo of her baby bump on Instagram this week

In the photo, Davina can be seen peering down at her baby bump as she places her hands affectionately on top.

'This week has been a little weird, earlier in the week I started getting some cramping and aches (even a labour scare lol) but it's also been the first week I've started spending more time on my exercise ball, and also doing some light techniques to help turn my breech little babe around,' she continued.

Despite the baby's breech position though, Davina insisted she's trying to stay calm throughout the whole experience.

Not long to go! The 28-year-old businesswoman is just five weeks away from giving birth

'I'm not too worried, if she doesn't turn, she doesn't turn... and that's totally OK,' she wrote.

'As long as she's safe and healthy that's all I care about (even though a C section scares me a little) if it has to be done, it has to be done!

'I've come to realise it doesn't matter how much you plan or prepare, sometimes your birth plan gets completely thrown out the window.'

'As long as she's safe and healthy that's all I care about': Davina has been sharing pregnancy updates on social media

Davina said she was going to simply 'surrender to the experience and keep an open mind'.

It's the first child for the former reality star and her fiance, Jaxon Manuel, but Davina claimed there hasn't been any new parent jitters.

'Overall, I'm feeling really calm, weirdly relaxed, and actually not stressed... which is funny because I'm a massive over thinker usually, but for this, I just feel ready,' she said.
description: Davina Rankin is just about ready to give birth.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
